name: Purple Guy's Story
description:
its your turn to play as the purple guy himself 

(WILLIAM AFTON) 

the story of fnaf starts at the school of purple guy as you try to find and date your new crush bella with the help of henry emily your school friend since birth

CONTROLS: 

key pressed z - confirm

key pressed x - decline

key pressed c - skip

key pressed backspace - go back to menu

key pressed escape - quit the game

HINT FOR THE SECRET ENDING:

there was once a moment in time where the eight-tree was still standing. The tree tops were shining of green. The lumberjack wanted to claim the tree as his so he used his pet mouse who would gradually change the color of the tree to claim it as his. He sent the mouse directly to the top of the tree in which the 8 eyed mouse spotted the tree 8 times in which then the tree turned purple 8 times.

(maybe your pet mouse and a treetop near qwin can help)
